#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long

ll gcd(ll a,ll b)
{
	if(a>b)
	return gcd(b,a);
	
	if(b%a==0)
	return a;
	
	return gcd(b%a,a);
}

int main()
{
    ll t,n,m,ne,no,me,mo,g,tmp,tmp2;
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
    	scanf("%lld %lld",&n,&m);
    	
    	g=1;
    	ne=n/2;no=n-ne;me=m/2;mo=m-me;
    	tmp=ne*mo + no*me;
    	tmp2=m*n;
    	
    	if(tmp!=0)
    	g=gcd(tmp,tmp2);
    	//cout<<tmp<<" "<<tmp2<<" "<<g<<endl;
    	printf("%lld/%lld\n",tmp/g,tmp2/g);
    }
    return 0;
}
